meanings.sent1: The archidiaconal robes were worn by the senior church official.
meanings.sent2: The archidiaconal duties included overseeing the church's administrative tasks.
meanings.sent3: The archidiaconal hat was so big that it kept falling off during the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: Her archidiaconal presence commanded respect from all who attended the service.
meanings.sent5: The archidiaconal authority was evident in the way he addressed the congregation.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to the office or duties of an archdeacon.
meanings.sent1: The archidiaconal responsibilities involved assisting the bishop.
meanings.sent2: The archidiaconal role required knowledge of church protocols.
meanings.sent3: The archidiaconal schedule was so busy that he barely had time for lunch.
meanings.sent4: Her archidiaconal influence extended beyond the church walls.
meanings.sent5: The archidiaconal presence added a sense of tradition to the ceremony.
